author: Reuters Editorial
title: Bahrain confirms six new coronavirus cases: state news agency
description: Bahrain's ministry of health on Sunday confirmed six new coronavirus cases, raising the total number to 47 cases, the state news agency said, citing a ministry statement.
content:

author: Reuters Editorial
title: Saudi Arabia announces first case of coronavirus
description: Saudi Arabia on Monday announced its first case of the new coronavirus, the health ministry said, according to the state news agency.
content:
CAIRO (Reuters) - Saudi Arabia on Monday announced its first case of the new coronavirus, the health ministry said, according to the state news agency. 
The infected person had come from Iran through Bahrain, the report added.
